job_history.work_description: Supervise a team of over 10 employees. Make adjustments on customer accounts as needed. Assist itune customers by adding or deleting services and products. As an adviser I am the customer's first point of contact representing Apple. Support many popular products like iPhones, iPads, MacBooks, and desktop Macs.

Looked up members charts to give lab results apon request. Assisted Members with appointments, referrals and tranferring to a nurse. Maintained 100% compliance with all hospital and government regulations (HIPPA). Confirmed and updated personal information every call to make sure Kaiser member accounts where up to date.

Supervised 10- 15 call center employees. Provided employee training as needed to my team. Assisted Comcast customers with billing inquiries and disputes. Implemented employee incentives to keep up employee morale.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Extensive experience supervising teams of over 10 employees in multiple roles, indicating expert-level mastery in leadership.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in customer-facing roles, handling customer inquiries, and resolving disputes, showing expert-level proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Proven experience in managing teams, providing employee training, and implementing incentives to boost morale, indicating strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Maintained 100% compliance with hospital and government regulations (HIPPA) in a previous role, showing a solid working proficiency in compliance.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Updated personal information and maintained accurate records in multiple roles, indicating a solid working proficiency in data entry.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with customers, team members, and management in various roles, suggesting strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Resolved customer disputes and handled billing inquiries, indicating strong proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Business Management
skills.explanation: Completed a Bachelor's degree in Business Management, but lacks direct work experience in this field, showing some practical knowledge.
